usermanagement

Class StaffManagementControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • usermanagement.StaffManagementControl

  • public class StaffManagementControl
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides management controls for staff, including doctors, pharmacists, and administrators. It allows the addition, updating, and deletion of staff members. Staff details are stored in a CSV file and loaded into memory using the InitialDataStaff class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StaffManagementControl(InitialDataStaff data)
      Constructs a StaffManagementControl instance with the provided data source.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAdministrator(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Adds a new administrator to the system.
      void addDoctor(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Adds a new doctor to the system.
      void addPharmacist(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Adds a new pharmacist to the system.
      void deleteStaff(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Deletes a staff member from the system.
      void displayStaff()
      Displays the details of all staff members (doctors, pharmacists, and administrators).
      void updateStaff(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Updates the details of an existing staff member.

    • Method Detail

      • displayStaff

        public void displayStaff()
        Displays the details of all staff members (doctors, pharmacists, and administrators).

      • addDoctor

        public void addDoctor(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Adds a new doctor to the system. Prompts the user for input via a scanner.
        Parameters:
        scanner - a Scanner object for user input.

      • addPharmacist

        public void addPharmacist(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Adds a new pharmacist to the system. Prompts the user for input via a scanner.
        Parameters:
        scanner - a Scanner object for user input.

      • addAdministrator

        public void addAdministrator(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Adds a new administrator to the system. Prompts the user for input via a scanner.
        Parameters:
        scanner - a Scanner object for user input.

      • updateStaff

        public void updateStaff(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Updates the details of an existing staff member. Prompts the user to select a staff member and specify new values.
        Parameters:
        scanner - a Scanner object for user input.

      • deleteStaff

        public void deleteStaff(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Deletes a staff member from the system. Prompts the user to select a staff member for deletion.
        Parameters:
        scanner - a Scanner object for user input.
